00014 #ifndef GPIB_H_
00015 #define GPIB_H_

00017 #include "charinterface.h"

00019 #ifdef HAVE_LINUX_GPIB
00020 #define GPIB_LINUX_NI
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #if defined WINDOWS || defined __WIN32__
00024 #define GPIB_WIN32_NI
00025 #define GPIB_WIN32_IF_4304
00026 #endif // WINDOWS || __WIN32__
00027 
00028 #if defined GPIB_LINUX_NI || defined GPIB_WIN32_NI
00029 #define GPIB_NI
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #if defined GPIB_WIN32_IF_4304 || defined GPIB_NI
00033 #define USE_GPIB
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifdef GPIB_NI
00037 
00038 class XNIGPIBPort : public XPort
00039 {
00040 public:
00041     XNIGPIBPort(XCharInterface *interface);
00042     virtual ~XNIGPIBPort();
00043  
00044     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00045     virtual void send(const char *str) throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00046     virtual void write(const char *sendbuf, int size) throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00047     virtual void receive() throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00048     virtual void receive(unsigned int length) throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00049 
00050 private:
00051     int m_ud;
00052     void gpib_close() throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00053     //! reopen device
00054     void gpib_reset() throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00055     void gpib_spoll_before_write() throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00056     void gpib_spoll_before_read() throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00057     XString gpibStatus(const XString &msg);
00058     unsigned int gpib_receive(unsigned int est_length, unsigned int max_length)
00059         throw (XInterface::XCommError &);
00060     static int s_cntOpened;
00061     static XMutex s_lock;
00062 };
00063 
00064 typedef XNIGPIBPort XGPIBPort;
00065 
00066 #endif /*GPIB_NI*/
